name.description: The location ID for the resource (last segment of the URL path). Must be `"0"` for jpg/png, `"0_0_1"` for DDS, `"0_0_2"` for KTX, and `"1"` for KTX2.

enum-description.jpg: JPEG compression. No mipmaps. Please note that alpha channel may have been added after the JPEG stream. This alpha channel is alwasy 8bit and zlib compressed. Last 4 bytes of the entire stream are the 32 bit offset to the beginning of the alpha stream (little-endian).
enum-description.dds: The DDS header will specify the type of compression and number of mipmaps. **WARNING:** Only DXT1 (no alpha) and DXT5 (alpha channel) are supported.
enum-description.ktx-etc2: Khronos group container for ETC2 compressed texture. Mipmap may be available. Note: KTX (Khronos Texture) is a lightweight file format for OpenGLÂ® textures, designed around how textures are loaded in OpenGL.
